update.description: This pull request is to reduce the inclusion of `Winsock2.h` in many headers and source files. This is motivated by the fact that `Windows.h` or `Winsock2.h` are using large namespaces and very often resulting in name conflicts. My intention is to reduce the chances hitting this problem when consuming `Gazebo` headers with other downstream projects.
update.title: [Windows][Gazebo9] Reduce the WinSock header inclusion
